trans-unit.source: Provides common methods and properties for composite activity designers that contain structured layouts.
trans-unit.target: Fornece métodos e propriedades comuns para designers de atividade de composição que contêm layouts estruturados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner> is the base class for all designers that contain child designers and the child designers are connected to each other using lines rendered on the design surface, called connectors.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner> é a classe base para todos os designers que contêm os designers de filho e os designers de filho são conectados entre si usando linhas renderizadas na superfície de design, chamada de conectores.

trans-unit.source: The class is provided so that activity designer developers can provide a number of activity designer layout types, rather than being tied to the layout provided in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: A classe é fornecida para que os desenvolvedores de designer de atividade podem fornecer um número de atividade de tipos de layout do designer, em vez de que está sendo vinculada ao layout fornecido no <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> classe.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementado em uma classe derivada, inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView" /> that contains information about the current designer view displayed by the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView" /> que contém informações sobre a exibição de designer atual exibida pelo <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView" /> that contains information about the current view displayed by the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView" /> que contém informações sobre o modo de exibição atual exibido pelo <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.ActiveView%2A> contains the view ID and any text, images, activity designers, and user data associated with the view.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.ActiveView%2A> contém a ID de exibição e qualquer texto, imagens, designers de atividade e dados de usuário associados à exibição.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> that contains the screen location at which to attempt to insert the activities.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> que contém o local da tela no qual tentar inserir as atividades.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> read-only collection that contains the activities to add.
trans-unit.target: A coleção somente leitura <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> que contém as atividades a serem adicionadas.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified activities can be added to the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> at the specified location on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se as atividades especificadas podem ser adicionadas ao <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> no local especificado na área de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified activities can be inserted at the specified location on the workflow design surface; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se as atividades especificadas podem ser inseridas no local especificado na área de design de fluxo de trabalho; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to lock a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner> by not allowing the insertion of child activities.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como bloquear uma <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner> por não permitir a inserção de filho atividades.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> read-only collection that contains the activities to remove.
trans-unit.target: A coleção somente leitura <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> que contém as atividades a serem removidas.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified activities can be removed from the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se as atividades especificadas podem ser removidas do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified activities can be removed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se as atividades especificadas podem ser removidas; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to override the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.CanRemoveActivities%2A> method to allow the moving of child activities within the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como substituir o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.CanRemoveActivities%2A> método para permitir a movimentação de atividades filho dentro do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a generic read-only collection that contains all activity designers that are children of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção genérica somente leitura que contém todos os designers de atividade que são filhos do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> read-only collection that contains the child designers.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> coleção somente leitura que contém os designers de filho.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the addition of a new branch using a designer based off of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra a adição de uma nova ramificação de usando um designer com base no logoff de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> classe.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.CanInsertActivities%2A> returns true, a new branch is created using the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.InsertActivities%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.CanInsertActivities%2A> retorna true, uma nova ramificação é criada usando o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.InsertActivities%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorHitTestInfo> object is created as a parameter to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.InsertActivities%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorHitTestInfo> será criado como um parâmetro para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.InsertActivities%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: When this is finished, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.EnsureVisibleContainedDesigner%2A> method is used to ensure that the newly added branch is displayed in the workflow designer by accessing a single object in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Quando isso for concluído, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.EnsureVisibleContainedDesigner%2A> método é usado para garantir que a ramificação recém-adicionado é exibida no designer de fluxo de trabalho, acessando um único objeto no <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A> coleção.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the current drop target in the array of drop targets returned by <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.GetDropTargets(System.Drawing.Point)" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o índice do destino de soltar atual na matriz de destinos de soltar retornado por <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.GetDropTargets(System.Drawing.Point)" />.

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the index of the current drop target for the designer.
trans-unit.target: Um inteiro que representa o índice do destino de soltar atual para o designer.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> on which to draw the connectors.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> no qual desenhar os conectores.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" /> to draw the connectors.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" /> para desenhar os conectores.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> array that contains the endpoints for each of the connectors to draw.
trans-unit.target: A matriz <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> que contém os pontos de extremidade para cada um dos conectores a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LineAnchor" /> that determines the graphic to draw at connector start points.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LineAnchor" /> que determina o gráfico a ser desenhado nos pontos iniciais do conector.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LineAnchor" /> that determines the graphic to draw at connector end points.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LineAnchor" /> que determina o gráfico a ser desenhado nos pontos finais do conector.

trans-unit.source: Draws all of the connectors to display on the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Desenha todos os conectores a serem exibidos no <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: Connectors are links between separate designers on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Conectores estão os links entre os designers separadas em uma superfície de design do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: These links appear as lines on the design surface and each line end connects to a visible point on the designers it connects.
trans-unit.target: Esses links aparecem como linhas na superfície de design e final de cada linha se conecta a um ponto visível sobre os designers de se conectar.

trans-unit.source: These points are called connection points.
trans-unit.target: Esses pontos são chamados de pontos de conexão.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> for which to ensure visibility on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> para o qual garantir visibilidade na área de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the specified activity designer is visible on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Garante que o designer de atividade especificado está visível na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Gets the first selectable object in the navigation order of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o primeiro objeto selecionável na ordem de navegação do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that is the first selectable object in the designer navigation order.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que é o primeiro objeto selecionável na ordem de navegação do designer.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.FirstSelectableObject%2A> returns the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView.AssociatedDesigner%2A> property that is exposed through <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.ActiveView%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.FirstSelectableObject%2A> Retorna o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> associados a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView.AssociatedDesigner%2A> propriedade que é exposta por meio de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.ActiveView%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> to query the design surface with.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> com o qual consultar a área de design.

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of valid drop locations on the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> surface.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma matriz de locais de destino válidos na superfície <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> array that represents the valid drop locations on the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> surface.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que representa os locais de destino válidos na superfície <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The DesignerEdges along which to search for connection points.
trans-unit.target: As DesignerEdges ao longo das quais pesquisar os pontos de conexão.

trans-unit.source: Returns a read-only collection of points that represent the inner connection points for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma coleção somente leitura de pontos que representam os pontos de conexão interna para o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> generic read-only collection that contains the inner connection points for the designer.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção genérica somente leitura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> que contém os pontos de conexão interna para o designer.

trans-unit.source: Connectors are links between separate designers on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Conectores estão os links entre os designers separadas em uma superfície de design do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: These links appear as lines on the design surface and each line end connects to a visible point on each designer it connects.
trans-unit.target: Esses links aparecem como linhas na superfície de design e final de cada linha se conecta a um ponto visível em cada designer se conecta.

trans-unit.source: These points are called connection points.
trans-unit.target: Esses pontos são chamados de pontos de conexão.

trans-unit.source: Designer classes that inherit from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner> class can contain other designers, and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.GetInnerConnections%2A> returns a read-only collection of all the connection points for the designers associated with `edges` that are contained by the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: Designers classes que herdam o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner> classe pode conter outros designers, e <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.GetInnerConnections%2A> retorna uma coleção somente leitura de todos os pontos de conexão para os designers associados `edges` contidos a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: The current object in the navigation order.
trans-unit.target: O objeto atual na ordem da navegação.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection" /> that determines the navigation order of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Uma <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection" /> que determina a ordem de navegação do designer.

trans-unit.source: Returns the first selectable object that follows the specified object in the navigation order for the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o primeiro objeto selecionável que segue o objeto especificado na ordem de navegação para o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: The first selectable <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that follows the <paramref name="obj" /> parameter in the navigation order.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro <see cref="T:System.Object" /> selecionável que segue o parâmetro <paramref name="obj" /> na ordem de navegação.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> with which to initialize the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> com o qual inicializar o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the designer by using the specified activity.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa o designer usando a atividade especificada.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.Initialize%2A> ensures that the active view loaded into the workflow design surface is a valid view.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.Initialize%2A> garante que o modo de exibição ativo carregado na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho é um modo de exibição válido.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> that specifies the location to add the activities.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> que especifica o local para adicionar as atividades.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> read-only collection that contains the activities to add to the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: A coleção somente leitura <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> que contém as atividades a serem adicionadas ao <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified activities to the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> at the specified location on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona as atividades especificadas ao <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> no local especificado da área de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Gets the last selectable object in the navigation order of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o último objeto selecionável na ordem de navegação do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that is the last selectable object in the designer navigation order.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que é o último objeto selecionável na ordem de navegação do designer.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner> is the active activity designer, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.LastSelectableObject%2A> returns `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner> é o designer de atividade do active <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.LastSelectableObject%2A> retorna `null` (`Nothing` no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: If a child activity designer is the active designer, it returns the last selectable object associated with the active child designer.
trans-unit.target: Se um designer de atividade filho é designer ativo, ele retorna o último objeto selecionável associado com o designer de filhos ativos.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.BinaryReader" /> used to restore the designer view state.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.IO.BinaryReader" /> usado para restaurar o estado da exibição do designer.

trans-unit.source: Loads the view state of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> from a binary stream.
trans-unit.target: Carrega o estado da exibição do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> de um fluxo binário.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="reader" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="reader" /> contém uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets the minimum size settings for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as configurações de tamanho mínimo para o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that represents the smallest possible size for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> que representa o menor tamanho possível para o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> that contains the location on the workflow design surface to move the activities.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> que contém o local na área de design de fluxo de trabalho para mover as atividades.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> read-only collection to move.
trans-unit.target: A coleção somente leitura <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> a ser movida.

trans-unit.source: Moves the specified activities from one designer displayed in the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> to another.
trans-unit.target: Move as atividades especificadas de um designer exibido no <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> para outro.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityChangedEventArgs" /> that contains information about the changed activity.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityChangedEventArgs" /> que contém informações sobre a atividade alterada.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the designer when the activity associated with it changes.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o designer quando a atividade associada a ele é alterada.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="e" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="e" /> é uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs" /> that contains information about the activities that changed.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs" /> que contém informações sobre as atividades que foram alteradas.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> when more than one of the activities it contains has changed.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> quando mais de uma das atividades que ele contém foi alterada.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs" /> that defines the operation event arguments.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs" /> que define os argumentos de evento de operação.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> when a drag-drop operation is completed with the bounds of its design surface.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> quando uma operação de arrastar e soltar é concluída dentro dos limites de sua área de design.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="e" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="e" /> contém uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs" /> that defines the operation event arguments.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs" /> que define os argumentos de evento de operação.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> when a drag-drop operation is in progress and the user's mouse cursor enters the bounds of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> quando uma operação de arrastar-soltar está em andamento e o cursor do mouse do usuário entra nos limites do designer.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="e" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="e" /> contém uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> when a drag-drop operation is in progress and the user's mouse cursor leaves the bounds of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> quando uma operação de arrastar e soltar está em andamento e o cursor do mouse do usuário deixa os limites do designer.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs" /> that defines the operation event arguments.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs" /> que define os argumentos de evento de operação.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> when a drag-drop operation is in progress and the user's mouse cursor is inside the bounds of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> quando uma operação de arrastar-soltar está em andamento e o cursor do mouse do usuário está dentro dos limites do designer.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="e" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="e" /> contém uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs" /> that contains the layout arguments.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs" /> que contém os argumentos de layout.

trans-unit.source: Performs layout tasks to position visual cues and child designers on the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Executa tarefas de layout para posicionar indicações visuais e designers filho no <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="e" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="e" /> contém uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs" /> that contains the layout arguments.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs" /> que contém os argumentos de layout.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> when the size of the visual cues on the designers displayed by the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> have changed.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> quando o tamanho das indicações visuais sobre os designers exibidos pelo <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> foi alterado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that represents the new size of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> que representa o novo tamanho do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> na área de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> that represents the location on the workflow design surface for which to show <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> que representa o local na área de design de fluxo de trabalho para a qual mostrar objetos <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction" />.

trans-unit.source: Displays the designer verbs associated with a smart tag at a specified location on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Exibe os verbos do designer associados a uma marcação inteligente em um local especificado na área de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView" /> that is to be set.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView" /> que deve ser definida.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> when the current designer view changes.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> quando a exibição do designer atual é alterada.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.BinaryWriter" /> to which the current designer view state is stored.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.IO.BinaryWriter" /> para o qual o estado da exibição do designer atual é armazenado.

trans-unit.source: Stores the current view state of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> to a binary stream.
trans-unit.target: Armazena o estado da exibição atual do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> em um fluxo binário.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> displays smart tags.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> exibe marcações inteligentes.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the designer displays smart tags; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o designer exibe as marcas inteligentes; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a read-only collection of designer actions that are associated with the smart tags on the designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção somente leitura das ações do designer associadas às marcações inteligentes do designer.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction" /> read-only collection that contains all the actions associated with the smart tags on the designer.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction" /> coleção somente leitura que contém todas as ações associadas com as marcas inteligentes do Designer.

trans-unit.source: The collection is returned only if the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner> hosts multiple views.
trans-unit.target: A coleção é retornada somente se o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner> hospeda vários modos de exibição.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.Views%2A> property to determine how many views the current designer hosts.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.Views%2A> propriedade para determinar quantas exibe os hosts de designer atuais.

trans-unit.source: Get a read-only collection of designer views that the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> hosts.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção somente leitura de exibições do designer hospedadas pelo <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView" /> read-only collection that contains the views hosted by the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView" /> coleção somente leitura que contém as exibições hospedadas pelo atual <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" />.
